meanings.sent1: Superheroes often have powerful emesises that challenge them at every turn.

meanings.sent3: The cat's emesises were the mischievous mice that stole its treats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fairy tales, the evil queen was Snow White's ultimate emesises.

meanings.definition: third person singular present of emesis
meanings.sent1: He emesises after eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: The baby often emesises when feeling unwell.
meanings.sent3: The clown emesises confetti during the funny performance.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of public speaking emesises as she steps onto the stage.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride made him emesises due to motion sickness.
